alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 10:40PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Holt and Boyd Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1040 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gross, or near Spencer, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Butte, Lynch, Gross, Bristow, Anoka, Monowi, Scottville, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Opportunity, Spencer Dam, Midway, Dorsey, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 281 between mile markers 200 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 106 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
